title: Virtual eXtensible Local Area Network (VXLAN): A Framework for Overlaying Virtualized Layer 2 Networks over Layer 3 Networks
abstract:
This document describes Virtual eXtensible Local Area Network
(VXLAN), which is used to address the need for overlay networks
within virtualized data centers accommodating multiple tenants.  The
scheme and the related protocols can be used in networks for cloud service
providers and enterprise data centers.  This memo documents the
deployed VXLAN protocol for the benefit of the Internet community.
